overview: Piers Linney is a qualified lawyer with a broad range of corporate finance and private equity experience gained at the law firm SJ Berwin and in commerce. He has worked as an investment banker in the M&A groups of Barclays de Zoete Wedd and Credit Suisse First Boston where he has specialised in domestic public transactions, cross border M&A, LBOs and transaction origination. A founder shareholder of Tower Gate Capital, he has also been involved in a number of venture capital backed start-up ventures.
